DOC.brief_title: Intrathecal Levobupivacaine With Opioids Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Following approval Baskent University Ethics Committee ( KA08/48 ) write informed consent patient , 93 pregnant woman 18 year age without fetal distress/anomaly ( gestational pregnancy age ≥ 36 week , height ≥ 155 cm , weight ≤110 kg , fetal weight ≥ 2500 g ) plan American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Physical Status I II elective caesarean section surgery enrol . Patients allergies local anesthetic , history hypersensitivity anaphylactic reaction , take emergency surgery , preeclampsia exclude . Patients randomize three group ( Fentanyl Group F , Sufentanil Group S , Control Group C ) computer , demographic data gestational age patient record . No premedications administer . Following monitoring patient ( non-invasive blood pressure , electrocardiogram pulse oxymeter ) , Ringer 's Lactate solution ( 15 ml/kg ) administer 10-15 minute . Spinal anesthesia administer midline approach L3-4 interval patient assume seated position . Spinal block perform anesthesiologist blind drug inject , drug syrinx prepare immediately injection another anesthesiologist otherwise involve study . Intraoperative postoperative assessment perform anesthesiologist blinded patient allocation study drug . 2.2 ml ( 11 mg ) levobupivacaine ( Chirocaine® , Abbott Laboratories , Ireland ) administer patient height < 163 cm , 2.4 ml ( 12 mg ) levobupivacaine administer patient height ≥163 cm ( Control Group ) . 2.2±0.2 ml 0.5 % levobupivacaine + 10 µg fentanil ( Fentanyl® , Johnson & Johnson , USA ) administer Group F 2.2±0.2 ml levobupivacaine + 2.5 µg sufentanil ( Sufenta® , Johnson & Johnson , USA ) administer Group S rate 3ml/30 sec . Following intrathecal administration , patient place supine position , head slightly elevate . Patients bring 15-20° left lateral position prevent aortocaval compression , oxygen ( 2-4 L/min ) provide face mask . Sensory block evaluate every two minute pin prick test , motor block evaluate Bromage scale ( 0=no motor loss ; 1= inability flex hip ; 2= inability flex knee ; 3= inability flex ankle ) . Onset time sensory motor block record . Surgical intervention initiate block reach T5 level . In case sensory block attain T5 level within 20 minute , general anesthesia administer . Duration sensory block , high level sensory block , time L1-T10 level , time two-segment T10 sensory block regression , onset end time motor block record . Systolic diastolic blood pressure ( SBP DBP ) , heart rate ( HR ) oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) evaluate every three minute first 15 minute , every five minute afterwards . If systolic blood pressure value decrease 20 % respect baseline value , decrease < 100 mmHg , fluid load ephedrine ( 5 mg ) administer . A decrease heart rate le 55 beats/min consider bradycardia , atropine ( 0.5 mg ) administer . A decrease respiratory rate le 10/min , decrease oxygen saturation le 90 % , consider indication respiratory depression . In case , support provide face mask ventilation . APGAR score evaluate ( minute 1 5 ) pediatrician information regard group . For blood gas measurement , sample obtain umbilical cord newborn . Intraoperative pain evaluation perform visual analog scale ( VAS score ; 0= No pain , 10= bad pain possible ) perform surgical incision , uterine incision , skin closure . In case VAS > 3 , IV fentanyl ( 50 µg ) administer . Sedation level monitor , propofol ( 0.5 mg/kg ) administer patient discomfort . When patient require 50 µg fentanyl and/or 0.5 mg/kg propofol , block consider unsuccessful general anesthesia administer . Intraoperative postoperative nausea , vomit , pruritus , respiratory depression side effect record first , second , sixth , twelfth hour . Metoclopramide ( 10 mg IV ) administer nausea , diphenhydramine ( 25 mg ) administer severe pruritus , Surgery procedures perform surgeon knowledge regard group . Surgeon satisfaction score evaluate accord sufficiency muscle relaxation provision adequate surgical condition ( 0= pair , 1= fair , 2= good , 3= excellent ) . The time first analgesic requirement record patient , pethidine hydrochloride ( 50 mg IM ) administer first analgesic . Following , analgesic treatment continue diclofenac sodium ( 75 mg IM ) additional analgesic among case VAS > 3 . Diclofenac sodium requirement first 24 hour record . Statistical Analysis Sensory block duration use main end-point statistical analysis . Power analysis base previous studies14,15 indicate minimum number patient require 80 % power ( α=0,05 , β=0,20 ) 24 per group detect 25 % difference sensory block duration . Statistical analysis perform use SPSS version 17.0 ( SPSS Inc , Chicago , Illinois ) . Categorical measurement record number percentage , continuous measurement mean standard deviation ( Mean±SD ) , also median ( minimum-maximum ) necessary . In comparison categorical variable , chi-square test Fischer 's exact test use . The ANOVA test use distribution , comparison continuous measurement group , Kruskal-Wallis test use parameter without normal distribution . Hemodynamic data analyze repeated measure analyse . Values p < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
